name: Ball Eater (Kiritoholy)
description:
Hey this game is totally satisfying and also pattern creating, it creates beautiful patterns when you play this game and this game only requires two keys to control, left and right key .

if you like you can also submit your pattern at instagram by using #balleater.

And if you like it you can also subscribe my youtube channel here.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx96AT0RKJnJTXR-G35hrGA
